of Agriculture and Social Development, starting today an agreement signed at the National Palace. (2/2) http://t.co/jWQhXSY6DP

The Government of Guatemala will formalize the delivery of properties to 110 families displaced from the Valle del Polochic, Alta Verapaz.
In October of last year, 140 families received title deeds to 11 caballerias from the Sactelá farms.
We are committed to providing land and deeds to 750 family groups that were evicted from Polochic in 2011.
#HuellaCero seeks to reduce the emission of greenhouse gases with measures that mitigate the production of carbon dioxide in the country.
To the extent that all join efforts will have a global response, with a shared but differentiated responsibility. #HuellaCero
